whenToUse: Prescribing a drug that is renally metabolized

pearlsPitfalls.title: From Dan Brown, PharmD, at Palm Beach Atlantic University, the primary author of the functional range of creatinine clearance paper
pearlsPitfalls.text: “The Cockcroft-Gault equation remains the gold standard after almost 40 years , despite inaccuracies that arise from variations in body composition among patients. Those who understand potential sources of error can adjust accordingly.”
